definition: to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

sentences.english: A blue shift was observed with increasing stress.
sentences.chinese: 随着应力的增大，观察到了谱峰明显的蓝移。

sentences.english: The PL spectra also shows a band-gap blue-shift.
sentences.chinese: PL测试也表明其能带发生蓝移。

sentences.english: Red position showed blue-shift with the increase of chlorophyll concentration.
sentences.chinese: 红谷吸收表现为随叶绿素含量提高而蓝移的特征。

sentences.english: Besides, the"Blue-shift"of phosphor's emission peak is observed as the content of boron increased.
sentences.chinese: 此外，材料的发射带随着硼酸含量的增加而出现蓝移。

sentences.english: Compared with crystal silicon, porous silicon has a stronger optical absorption and blue shift has taken place at its absorption edge.
sentences.chinese: 同单晶硅相比，其吸收边发生了蓝移，并且吸收强烈。

sentences.english: With erosion time extending, luminescence peak will also have a blue-shift.
sentences.chinese: 随着腐蚀时间的延长，多孔硅的发光峰位也发生蓝移。

sentences.english: The resonant wavelength has a blue-shift when the length of the antenna is decreased.
sentences.chinese: 天线臂长的减小，使得共振波长蓝移。

sentences.english: The blueshifting continues without abatement, down to arbitrarily short distances.
sentences.chinese: 蓝移会持续下去到任意短的距离。
从埃尔顿1976年的专辑的蓝移。

sentences.english: Red and blue shifts were not found at absorption peak positions.
sentences.chinese: 随着温度升高，峰值位置未见红移或蓝移。

sentences.english: Blue shift of absorbing peak was observed as the diameter of nano-ZnO decreased.
sentences.chinese: 同时随粒径的减小，吸收峰发生蓝移。

sentences.english: The animation below schematically shows what a redshift and blueshift might look like, again using a car as an example.
sentences.chinese: 下面的动画显示了红移或蓝移看上去的可能样子。

sentences.english: The cause of blue shift is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了发射波长蓝移的原因。

sentences.english: The blue shift is reduced with increase of exciting wavelength.
sentences.chinese: 并且随激发波长的增长，蓝移减小。
